title: (x) brodie - Garth Graphic (slanted) {Mark S}
content: Looks like [Fairfield Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052220/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/fairfield-lh/85-heavy/testdrive.html?s=brodie&p=48), vertically squished and horizontally skewed for that faux-italic look.
author: franz

comments.content: This one has been bugging me, but I think I got it: [Garth Graphic Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052220/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/F/GART/F_GART-10019000.jhtml;jsessionid=PXW5SX0M2PR4TQFI0IKRLMGAVDJBIIV1) slanted.
Hey, you're right! Sorry, I didn't look closely enough, some of the serifs on Fairfield are really off.. Good one, Mark!
